summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3636 , for the improvement of the alley in block 1, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44922 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
